title: Game not in history, Lol client DCs, starts updating to newest version Mid game...Help
body:
What the hell just happened i was in a ranked game. I never have connection issues did i just get ddosed/drop hacked?? If that is the case will i get loss forgiven? Its been stuck on update screen for 5 minutes....

"We have restored this version of Lol to an older version. We'l try to patch it up to the latest version."

I seriously think i just got drop hacked or something. I NEVER DC my internet connection is stable at all times. Is there anything i can do if that is the case? 

UPDATE: THE GAME ISNT EVEN IN MY HISTORY AND I DIDNT LOSE ANY LP!? It consumed my "autofill protection" What the hell is going on I was in a game a few minutes ago... I "dced at 12 minutes walking to lane...

replies.body: Ahhhh it sounds like that game actually completely crashed. It's pretty rare, but when it does happen everyone will be dropped out and able to queue back up for another match. You shouldn't lose any LP or get any penalties, so it'll be as if the game never took place at all.
Also had something similar happen to me. Now having major issues since.
this happened to me around 12 minutes into a game too ... feels bad
This just happened to me too
